item.SHORT_TEXT: Custom popup screen with Grid functionality

RSFDO.STEXT: Full demo with all available functionality
Demo data has been provided, user can enter custom field such as Title, header
Row selection mode: A, B, C or D
Structure for call back form in Grid pop up
Need to assign one button as exit point
